title: CNBC covers launch of the Google Wallet.
summary: Paul Galant, CEO of Citi's Global Enterprise Payments, spoke to CNBC about Citi's role as the lead bank in the launch of the Google Wallet, a new technology giving customers the option of making digital payments at point-of-sale with a smart phone.
tag-1: CNBC covers launch of the Google Wallet.
tag-2: Paul Galant, CEO of Citi's Global Enterprise Payments, spoke to CNBC about Citi's role as the lead bank in the launch of the Google Wallet, a new technology giving customers the option of making digital payments at point-of-sale with a smart phone.
